    strs

    This package provides string functions that are analogous to those used by Python’s str class. All functions use stringi or stringr, so this package is mostly a convenience wrapper for anyone regularly switching between Python and R.

    Install

    This package still needs to be added to CRAN.

    remotes::install_github("pyRomatics/strs")
